main_definition: Savage can refer to something fierce, cruel, or uncontrolled in nature, as well as describe a person who is primitive or uncivilized.

meanings_and_examples.example: The storm was so savage that it uprooted trees and destroyed buildings.
His savage outburst shocked everyone in the room.
The movie depicted a savage battle between two warring factions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Uncultured, primitive or barbaric in behavior
meanings_and_examples.example: Some people still hold onto their primitive and savage ways of living.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exhibiting a lack of restraint or discipline
meanings_and_examples.example: His savage tendencies made it difficult for him to maintain healthy relationships.
